name: Tamagotchi no Doki Doki Dream Omisecchi
name_original: Tamagotchi no Doki Doki Dream Omisecchi
description: 'Tamagotchi no Doki Doki Dream Omisecchi' (otherwise known as たまごっちのドキドキドリームおみせっち) is a Tamagotchi game developed by Bandai Namco Games for the Nintendo 3DS. It was released only in Japan on May 23rd, 2013. You play as one of various Tamagotchi characters in quick succession, as you work for a variety of stores with dream occupations, and expand the ever-growing barren town for future facilities and residents. It is the third of six Tamagotchi 3DS entries.
